value.title: StarCraft 2: The UNEXPECTED Result! (Maru vs Harstem)
value.excerpt: Very fun match of professional StarCraft 2 between Maru and Harstem. value.excerpt: Welcome to the new Terran ladder series! This time, it's "Never Attack to Grandmaster!"
